xdb
Interface documentProxy

All Known Implementing Classes:
fsProxyImpl
public abstract interface documentProxy

XDB is able to operate with every XML-like resource, as far as it comes with an implementation of this interface. An implementation has to come along with a fabric functionality for constructing DOM1 conformant objects.
It is guaranteed that the document is first loaded to the proxy before the other primitives are called.

Method Summary
 void create(URI resource, java.lang.String rootNode)
          Creates an empty document
 org.w3c.dom.Document getDOM()
          Gets the corresponding DOM1 representation of the document
 URI load()
          Inits the proxy with an empty document
 void load(URI resource)
          Inits the proxy with a specified resource
 void save(URI resource)
          Commits the work done with the proxy and stores the document persistently at the specified location
